DataShape.description: An extension of the AnalyticsDatasetRef which includes information to assist in distinguishing created datasets
DataShape.name: AnalyticsDatasetRefWithTags

FieldDefinition.description: The date and time that the create dataset ref job was posted
FieldDefinition.name: createdDateAndTime

FieldDefinition.description: An infotable necessary to pass data as part of a request body. Use this parameter ONLY when the datasetUri parameter is body:/. The infotable must be flat (cannot contain nested infotables) and its definition must match the corresponding infotable for the metadata parameter. This infotable must include a row of data for each record. For more information, see Key Analytics Infotables in the Analytics Help Center.
FieldDefinition.name: data

FieldDefinition.description: Fields to remove from the dataset
FieldDefinition.name: exclusions

FieldDefinition.description: Number of fields in the dataset
FieldDefinition.name: fieldCount

FieldDefinition.description: SQL WHERE clause to refine the dataset
FieldDefinition.name: filter

FieldDefinition.description: The date and time that the latest append dataset ref job was posted
FieldDefinition.name: lastUpdatedDateAndTime

FieldDefinition.description: Metadata of the dataset (for providing data as part of request)
FieldDefinition.name: metadata

FieldDefinition.description: Number of rows in the dataset
FieldDefinition.name: rowCount

FieldDefinition.description: Queryable tags associated to this dataset
FieldDefinition.name: tags
